name: Inoreader - Orange and Black
description: An Style sheet for the Inoreader update in 2014. Makes font colors orange and adds hover effects to make reading easier.
additional_info:
- Works with Inoreader 2014 and not Inoreader classic. 
- Works with Inoreader dark theme. 
- Adjustmensts can be made in the CSS to change colors and match Inoreader light theme. 
- Explanations are provided for each line of code.
